answers.answer: There are several different medications used for type 2 diabetes, all of which work to lower blood sugar in a little different way.  Talk with your doctor about which one might be right for you.
Ask for Actos, I took it for my tyoe II. There are other medications too, talk to your doctor.

question: yes i have been on metformin for the last 5 years butbegin of this year it start to make me sick when i take it is it another medience i could take.thank you.
